-------------------------------------------------------------------------
                           Credits
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bass..........................: Marco Gallesi
Drums.........................: Giorgio Diaferia
Electric Piano, Synth.........: Marco Cimino
Flute, Guitar.................: Claudio Montafia
Guitar (tracks: 1, 2).........: Mike Abate
Percussions (tracks: 1, 2) ...: Marco Astarita
Piano..(tracks: 1, 2).........: Aldo Rindone 
Saxophone (tracks: 3 - 7).....: Arturo Vitale 
Soprano Sax,Oboe (tracks:1,2).: Gianni Cinti     

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Esagono 70's italian jazzrock progressive band, born from the ashes of
Arti & Mestieri. The project was to melt jazzrock and classic music 
dealing with musicians coming out from Conservatories ( Statal music 
schools) Claudio Montafia,flute, Gianni Cinti, oboe, Marco Gallesi, bass
( ex Arti & Mestieri).  Marco Cimino, keyboards and cello ( ex Errata 
Corrige nad A&M),Giorgio Diaferia, drums. First release "Vicolo" 1977, cd
in 2005, "Due" (LP 1977) 2007, forthcoming "Apocalypso" 2008.
